meanings.definition: The act of creating a work of art by assembling various materials onto a surface.
meanings.sent1: Collaging can be a fun way to express creativity.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her collaging skills at the art exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The children enjoyed collaging with colorful paper and glue.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a collage of memories, collaging photos and tickets on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The artist's collaging of textures and colors was truly captivating.

meanings.sent1: I will be collaging pictures for my school project.
meanings.sent2: They spent the afternoon collaging old magazines onto a poster.
meanings.sent3: He was collaging so enthusiastically that he accidentally glued his fingers together.
meanings.sent4: She was collaging memories together like pieces of a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Collaging different fabrics together can result in a unique design.
